page.title: 09COMMUNICATION
page.content: Today communication is at a high level, ranging from people talking normally to telephones with screens. Nowadays people can talk to each other miles apart and soon you might be able to see them on the telephone screens when they come into the shops. No more funny phone calls or heavy breathers. Communication is out of this world. With all those satelites British Telecom are making all sorts of gadgets TV phones for example which can be used to communicate with. Most houses have now got phones and TV, these are very common and we take them for granted. If you don't have a phone you can go outside and use a public one. Public telephones are good for emergencies like when your car has broken down.
